title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 477.5 - Use of civil service competitive lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 477.5 - Use of civil service competitive lists

State Regulations

In the discretion of the superintendent and by mutual
agreement with the Department of Civil Service, appointments and promotions to
positions subject to competitive examination may be made from lists established
by the Department of Civil Service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
477.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
